description: [PittyTiger](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0011) has obtained and used tools such as [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) and [gsecdump](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0008).(Citation: Bizeul 2014)

external_references.description: Bizeul, D., Fontarensky, I., Mouchoux, R., Perigaud, F., Pernet, C. (2014, July 11). Eye of the Tiger. Retrieved September 29, 2015.
